ComicInfo.Summary: Brit and his wife Jessica have a date night - what can go wrong? Answer: EVERYTHING! Enter: The Walking Dread! He's an unstoppable killing machine who doesn't care how long it's been since you've had a lovely evening with your wife. All this and a surprising confession from Kaboomerang that you won't believe!
ComicInfo.Characters: Robot,Kaboomerang,Ms. Popper,Set,El Chupacabra,Brit,Le Brusier,Pegasus,Mauler Twins,Monster Girl,Walking Dread,Outrun,Cecil Stedman,Kid Thor,Bulletproof,Embrace,Black Samson,Knockout,Yeti,Donald Ferguson,Shapesmith
